name: Plugins - Enabled (with plugin uploads disabled in config.json)

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Plugins - Enabled (with plugin uploads disabled in config.json)
————————————————————————————
  1. With plugin uploads disabled in config.json, enable plugins in System Console
inline.expectedResult:
• Pre-packaged plugins appear
  • Choose file / Upload buttons are disabled

customFields.Important notes about this step: Note: Test on server with plugin uploads disabled in config.json; these settings can change. Usually windows.test.mattermost.com
